name: counter
description: An Assemblyscript counter that lives in the NEAR blockchain

scripts.build: cd contract && npm run build && mkdir -p ../out && rm -f ./out/counter.wasm && cp ./build/release/counter_contract.wasm ../out/main.wasm
scripts.start: npm run deploy && echo The app is starting! && env-cmd -f ./neardev/dev-account.env parcel frontend/index.html --open
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:unit: npm run build && cd contract && npm i && npm run test
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:integration:ts && npm run test:integration:rs
scripts.test:integration:rs: npm run build && cd integration-tests/rs && cargo run --example integration-tests
